snippet.title: Smalland: Survive the Wilds | 1.0 & Console Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
A new beginning beckons for the Smallfolk! We’re proud to announce that Smalland: Survive the Wilds will leave Early Access and hit v1.0 on 7th December 2023

Your tiny adventures are about to grow into something big! 🌍✨
📆 Mark your calendars for December 7th when the eagerly awaited 1.0 version lands on PC, PlayStation 5, & Xbox Series X|S! 🎮

Pre-order https://bit.ly/SmallConsole

A new generation is about to rise from the burrows!
